sqlMap.statement:
INSERT INTO DAILY_SALES SELECT A.DATE, A.LOGIN_TYPE AS GAME_TYPE, A.DEVICE_TOKEN AS DEVICE_TYPE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_MST WHERE DATE_FORMAT(JOIN_DT, '%Y%m%d') = A.DATE AND LOGIN_TYPE = A.LOGIN_TYPE AND DEVICE_TOKEN = A.DEVICE_TOKEN) AS NEW_USER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUY_HISTORY P INNER JOIN USER_MST Q ON (P.USER_ID = Q.USER_ID) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(P.REG_DT, '%Y%m%d') = A.DATE AND Q.LOGIN_TYPE = A.LOGIN_TYPE AND Q.DEVICE_TOKEN = A.DEVICE_TOKEN ) AS BUY_CNT, (SELECT GET_BUY_AMT(A.DATE, A.LOGIN_TYPE, A.DEVICE_TOKEN)) AS BUY_AMT, SUM(IF(A.ITEM_ID IN ('fb_share', 'cacao_share', 'story_share'), 1, 0)) AS SHARE_TOT, SUM(IF(A.ITEM_ID = 'adv', 1, 0)) AS ADV_CNT, SUM(IF(A.ITEM_ID = 'fb_share', 1, 0)) AS SHARE_FB, SUM(IF(A.ITEM_ID = 'cacao_share', 1, 0)) AS SHARE_CACAO, SUM(IF(A.ITEM_ID = 'story_share', 1, 0)) AS SHARE_STORY, SUM(IF(A.ITEM_ID = 'feedback', 1, 0)) AS FEEDBACK_CNT,
(SELECT GET_USER_CNT(A.DATE, A.LOGIN_TYPE, A.DEVICE_TOKEN) ) AS GAME_USER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GAME_RES S INNER JOIN USER_MST T ON ( S.USER_ID = T.USER_ID ) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(S.REG_DT, '%Y%m%d') = A.DATE AND T.LOGIN_TYPE = A.LOGIN_TYPE AND T.DEVICE_TOKEN = A.DEVICE_TOKEN ) AS GAME_CNT, NOW(), #SUM_CNT#
FROM ( SELECT #SUMUP_DT# AS DATE, Z.LOGIN_TYPE, Z.DEVICE_TOKEN, X.USER_ID, X.ITEM_ID, X.REG_DT FROM ( SELECT LOGIN_TYPE, DEVICE_TOKEN FROM USER_MST WHERE DEVICE_TOKEN IS NOT NULL GROUP BY LOGIN_TYPE, DEVICE_TOKEN ) Z LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.USER_ID, C.LOGIN_TYPE, C.DEVICE_TOKEN, B.ITEM_ID, B.REG_DT FROM REWARD_HEART_HISTORY B INNER JOIN USER_MST C ON (B.USER_ID = C.USER_ID) WHERE DATE_FORMAT(B.REG_DT, '%Y%m%d') = #SUMUP_DT# AND B.ITEM_ID IN ('adv', 'fb_share', 'cacao_share', 'story_share', 'feedback') ) X ON (X.LOGIN_TYPE = Z.LOGIN_TYPE AND X.DEVICE_TOKEN = Z.DEVICE_TOKEN)
) A GROUP BY A.DATE, A.LOGIN_TYPE, A.DEVICE_TOKEN
